title: E-comm Solution
subtitle: Complete solutions for e-commerce photography
description: Our E-comm Solution offers a comprehensive range of specialized photography services for e-commerce, designed to showcase your products and optimize your online presence.
intro: Discover our different solutions adapted to all your e-commerce photography needs.

eclipse.title: Eclipse
eclipse.description: Product photography with specific lighting eliminating shadows, ideal for shiny and transparent objects.

horizontal.title: Horizontal
horizontal.description: Flat lay photography perfect for clothing, accessories, and objects presented from a top-down view.

vertical.title: Vertical
vertical.description: Standing product photography, ideal for bottles, furniture, and objects requiring a height-oriented presentation.

live.title: Live
live.description: Real-time photography and videography for product demonstrations, events, and interactive sessions.

benefits.title: Why choose our E-comm Solution?
list: Solutions adapted to all types of products
